title: Loot Club
body:
Hey just looking for people to play aram/special modes to get loot.
I'm not interested in rift/ranked games.
Whether joining a club or creating a new one.

replies.body: Really hard to get loot in aram
not at all. really easy to get chests if you team up. harder to get keys maybe.
Having said that i just won pulsefire Ezrael in a crate. 3k of red shit to unlock!
